product.name: CoverGirl Ink it! By Perfect Point Plus Eyeliner
product.description:
Get inked — without the commitment! Ink It! colors glide on smoothly and
 easily without skipping, dragging, or pulling. The bright, bold shades 
last all day long.Features: Bright, bold colors for new looks Lasts all day long ­­— no smudging or creasingExpert precision applicationTwist up design
